description: A group of affinity scheduling rules.

nodeAffinity.description: Node affinity scheduling rules for the pod.

podAffinity.description: Pod affinity scheduling rules (e.g. co-locate this pod in the same node, zone, etc. as some other pod(s)).

podAntiAffinity.description: Pod anti-affinity scheduling rules (e.g. avoid putting this pod in the same node, zone, etc. as some other pod(s)).
